name: Plateau of Tomorrow
description: Journey back in time to investigate how far Romulus's newfound connection to humanity goes... and whether it is for the better, or worse.
rules:
-- Unique Klingon, Dominion, Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Travers, Torres, Kirk, Humanoid Figure, or Enterprise crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Travers, Torres, Kirk, Humanoid Figure, or Enterprise crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Jhamel
featured_crew.flavor: A member of the Aenar subspecies, Jhamel used her telepathy to find and contact her brother through the use of a telepresence unit.

screens.text: "Human history has clearly been changed in some way to include the Romulans. They now seem to be the first alien life we encountered--and partnered with."
"Are we sure we were their partners? We could have just as easily been their slaves. Considering Earth's history with the Romulans in the present timeline, I wouldn't rule it out."

"We've planned an expedition through history to pinpoint the moment of first contact between humans and Romulans. The technology is... unpredictable, so we're going to a time we know we can hit with reasonable accuracy: the 1930s and 40s, or World War II."

"You might as well come along, too, Captain. Everyone else is--the Klingons, the Dominion, the Terran Empire. They all claim to be very concerned about humanity. I'd bet they're just concerned about how a Romulan-influenced Earth might affect them."
